```{r include = F}
qq_wrapper <- function(exposure, statistic, filename_suffix = "") {
  knitr::include_graphics(paste0("/media/work/gwis/posthoc/", exposure, "/qq_", statistic, "_", exposure, filename_suffix, ".png"))
}
```

### G
```{r , echo=FALSE, out.width = '100%'}
qq_wrapper(exposure = params$exposure, statistic = 'chiSqG')
```

### GxE
```{r , echo=FALSE, out.width = '100%'}

```
